description:
tiff: support writing files with differencing predictor.

This will make more sense after implementing compression.

messages.text:
Hello nigeltao@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.image

LGTM.

Submitting...

https://codereview.appspot.com/6567077/diff/2002/tiff/writer_test.go
File tiff/writer_test.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/6567077/diff/2002/tiff/writer_test.go#newcode22

Delete these for now. Add them back in the CL that adds compression support.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=a0de9da0017e&repo=image ***

This will make more sense after implementing compression.
